game.name: Rogue Factory
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The AUTOMATION bullet heaven! Build your custom spellcasting factory and tear through endless waves of monsters. Unlock 20+ characters and 100+ golden totems to craft broken roguelite synergies and survive the swarm! Build, automate, autocast, OBLITERATE!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The AUTOMATION bullet heaven! Build your custom spellcasting factory and tear through endless waves of monsters. Unlock 20+ characters and 100+ golden totems to craft broken roguelite synergies and survive the swarm! Build, automate, autocast, OBLITERATE!
